snippet: Jean-Christophe Maillot, the director of Les Ballets de Monte Carlo, discusses his philosophy as his troupe prepares to dance “Lac,” his reworking of “Swan Lake,” at City Center.
abstract: Jean-Christophe Maillot, director of Ballets de Monte Carlo, discusses his philosophy as his troupe prepares to dance ballet Lac, his reworking of Swan Lake, at City Center.
lead_paragraph: Jean-Christophe Maillot, the director of Les Ballets de Monte Carlo, discusses his philosophy as his troupe prepares to dance “Lac,” his reworking of “Swan Lake,” at City Center.

headline.seo: Jean-Christophe Maillot Brings ‘Lac’ to City Center
headline.main: His Swans Are Primal, Yet Very Precise
headline.print_headline: His Swans Are Primal, Yet Very Precise
